main event: Three lights were observed circling in the sky in Milford, Michigan on June 27, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes,The objects were described as round lights with a white trail,The observer possibly saw the lights from nearby aircraft known to be in the area at the time,The report was filed under Project Blue Book for further investigation,The investigation remains unconfirmed, suggesting uncertainty about the nature of the lights.
sighted object: three lights circling in the sky
